briefTitle: Two Dimensional (2D) Silicon Transducer-Compression Plates for Breast Ultrasound
officialTitle: 2D Silicon Transducer-Compression Plates for Breast Ultrasound
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To prove the significance/capability of 3D Ultrasound imaging in comparison to current mammographic imaging.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Healthy women OR
* Women with suspected benign masses who may/or may not be going to biopsy
* Women with cysts where no biopsy is recommended

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who are pregnant
* Women with breast implants
* Prisoners
